email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. The starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. However, the demurrage rate is still a bit steep. Could we negotiate it down to $12,000 per day? Also, could you confirm the vessel's ETA at Rotterdam? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve managed to get the demurrage rate down to $13,000 per day, which is the best I can do. The vessel’s ETA at Rotterdam is October 14. Let me know if we can proceed with these terms. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for your efforts. We can proceed with the freight rate of $48.50 and demurrage at $13,000 per day. Please send over the charter party for review. Looking forward to finalizing this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. I’ll have the charter party drafted and sent over to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let’s keep in touch for any further details. Best, Sarah
